Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction soon. Kind regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
